title: Google\Cloud\DevTools\Source\V1\GerritSourceContext
name: GerritSourceContext
description:
A SourceContext referring to a Gerrit project.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.source.v1.GerritSourceContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.host_uri
params.description: The URI of a running Gerrit instance.

params.name: data.gerrit_project
params.description: The full project name within the host. Projects may be nested, so "project/subproject" is a valid project name. The "repo name" is hostURI/project.

params.name: data.alias_name
params.description: The name of an alias (branch, tag, etc.).

params.name: data.alias_context
params.description: An alias, which may be a branch or tag.
